scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run -s og-image && npm run -s deck
scripts.deck: marp --no-stdin slides/hassio_lab.md -o dist/index.html && npm run -s vbox && npm run -s bring_up && ncp assets dist/assets
scripts.vbox: marp --no-stdin slides/vbox.md -o dist/vbox.html && marp --no-stdin slides/vbox.md -o dist/vbox.pdf
scripts.bring_up: marp --no-stdin slides/bring_up.md -o dist/bring_up.html && marp --no-stdin slides/bring_up.md -o dist/bring_up.pdf
